titleStmt.title: A Christians preparation to the worthy receiuing of the blessed sacrament of the Lords Supper
titleStmt.author: Field, Theophilus, 1574-1636.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Augustine Mathewes for Tho. Thorp,

notesStmt.note: Dedication to the Duchess of Lennox signed: "Theoph. Landauensis", i.e. Theophilus Field.
Running title reads: A preparation to the Sacrament.
Reproduction of the original in the Sion College. Library.
